RESOURCE.STRING:
Initial Conditions 
1. Engine stopped 
Steps 
1. Select Start 
2. Select the desired Intake Air Heater to override 
3. Monitor the selected Intake Air Heater for operation 
Additional Information 
1. The Intake Air Heater will stay on for a maximum of %1!s! seconds 
2. A click should be heard if the Intake Air Heater is operative 
3. If required, select Stop to end the test early 
4. If ECM Communication Lost. All parameters will return to their original value when keyswitch is turned off.
This test is used to manually turn the Intake Air Heaters on and off to check the operation of the heaters.
ECM Calibration does not support this test.

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16100</ErrorNumber> <Description> An unknown exception occurred during the Intake Air Heater ECM test. </Description> <Suggestion>Please restart INSITE. If the problem persists, contact the INSITE Help Desk </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16101</ErrorNumber> <Description> A pointer to the Intake Air Heater Override Helper could not be gotten. </Description> <Suggestion> Reinstall INSITE </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16102</ErrorNumber> <Description> Failure to start the test. </Description> <Suggestion> Restart INSITE If the problem occurs persistently, please contact the INSITE Help Desk</Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16103</ErrorNumber> <Description>An error occurred while writing a parameter to the ECM. </Description> <Suggestion> </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>
<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16104</ErrorNumber> <Description> An error occurred while reading a parameter. </Description> <Suggestion> </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16105</ErrorNumber> <Description> Invalid value for the 24 Volt Enable parameter. </Description> <Suggestion> Recalibrate the ECM with a valid calibration </Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16106</ErrorNumber> <Description>The parameter being read had an invalid value. </Description> <Suggestion> Recalibrate the ECM with a valid calibration</Suggestion> </ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo> <ErrorNumber>16107</ErrorNumber> <Description>This action cannot be completed at this time. The ECM is currently locked by another activity in progress and is not available.</Description> <Suggestion> This may be caused by an ECM test running or a calibration download in progress.Please try again after the activity has completed.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
Intake Air Heater Maximum Override Time
ECM Communication Lost. All parameters will return to their original value when keyswitch is turned off.
The ECM detects a condition in which the Intake Air Heater Override Test cannot be ran. Please select Help for further detail.
The Intake Air Heater Test is running.
